newsitem.title: BOTSWANA: BURKINA FASO PRESIDENT TO VISIT BOTSWANA NEXT WEEK.
newsitem.headline: BURKINA FASO PRESIDENT TO VISIT BOTSWANA NEXT WEEK.

text.p: President of Burkina Faso, Blaise Compaore, will visit Botswana for five days from Monday, May 26, a Botswana presidential official said on Friday.
Botswana does not have diplomatic relations with Burkina Faso and there is no trade between the two countries.
The presidential official said Compaore would meet Botswana President Ketumile Masire and leader of the opposition Botswana National Front, Kenneth Koma.
He will also tour several state and private-owned factories.
